title: Categorising biometric data in the area of law enforcement (Art. 5(1)(g) carve-out)

nodes.label: Categorising biometric data in law enforcement area

question.prompt: Is it categorising biometric data in the area of law enforcement (not deducing sensitive attributes of individuals)?

items.label: Recital (30)
items.text: Recital clarifies that categorising biometric data in law enforcement area is not covered by the prohibition on deducing sensitive attributes.
